input_email_body:
Subject: Concerning System Security Breach Customer Support,

An unauthorized access attempt on our medical data systems was detected last night. This may have occurred due to a phishing email targeting our staff. We recommend updating passwords and running a security scan to mitigate the risk My name is Fatima Al-Farsi.. The security of our medical data systems is of utmost importance, and we are taking this incident very seriously.

We would like to request your assistance in investigating this matter and providing guidance to prevent similar incidents in the future. Please let us You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com.
